import sys

N, K = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

snuke = [0 for _ in range(N)]
for _ in range(K):
    d = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    for i in map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()):
        snuke[i-1] += 1

print(sum([1 for s in snuke if s == 0]))

N, K = map(int, input().split())
A = [0 for i in range(N)]
for i in range(K):
    d = int(input())
    A_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
    for j in range(d):
        A[A_list[j] - 1] += 1
print(N - sum(A))

N, K = map(int, input().split())

snukes = [0] * N
for i in range(K):
    d = int(input())
    for j in map(int, input().split()):
        snukes[j-1] += 1

print(sum([snukes[i] == 0 for i in range(N)]))

N, K = map(int, input().split())

snuke = [0] * N
for _ in range(K):
  d = int(input())
  a = list(map(int, input().split()))
  for i in a:
    snuke[i-1] += 1

print(len([x for x in snuke if x == 0]))
